# Radio Group ## Demo ### Column Use `layout="column"` to display all radio buttons horizontally arrange in columns with a fixed set of 3 radio buttons in desktop and stacked on mobile. radio button 1 radio button 2 radio button 3 disabled & checked radio button 4 ### List Includes the same paddings as a `<wc-list>` and `<wc-list-item>` Is v-model cool? yes hell yeah! of course! no Radio group value: {{radioGroup1}}

Remember to link the radio buttons v-model to the same parent's value, so there can be only 1 radio button selected at the same time. Also, remember to give them the same name, so the keyboard navigation works appropriately. ### Row Use `layout="row"` to display all radio buttons horizontally arrange in rows, without a fixed number of radio buttons per row. radio button 1 radio button 2 radio button 3 disabled & checked radio button 4 Radio group value: {{radioGroup2}}
